name: 汪建民
objective:
This course is a special topics of Optical, Electrical and Magnetic Properties of Energy-related Materials, including: 1.Crystal Structures and Crystal Binding; 2.Energy Bands and Electrical Properties; 3.Semiconductor Physics and p-n Junction Diodes; 4.Photovoltaic Effects and Solar Electricity; 5.Optoelectronic Effects- Efficiency and LEDs; 6.Hall Effects and Magnetic Properties

介紹能源材料相關的電性質、磁性質及光學性質，包括 1.晶體結構與晶格能 2.材料的能帶與電性質 3.半導體物理與p-n結二極體 4.光伏效應與太陽能電池 5.材料的光電效應與LED 6.霍爾效應與磁性質
schedule:
Chap I: Renewable Energy & Solar Potential
      (再生能源與太陽能之展望)
Chap II: Crystal Chemistry and Crystallography
      (晶體化學和結晶學)
Chap III: Electric Property--Semiconductor and Solar Cell 
      (材料電性和太陽能電池)
Chap IV: Optoelctronic Effects--Light-Emitting Diodes 
      (材料光電性和LED, 發光二極體)
Chap V: Hall Effect and Magnetic Property--Nano-bits Media
      (材料霍爾效應與磁性和磁記錄中的奈米世界)
scorePolicy:
Mid-Term Exam (期中考) 25%，  
Term Paper (期末報告) 35%，  
Home Work, Quiz and Class Performance (習題, 小考與上課表現) 40%。
materials:
1. Class Note
2. “Introduction to Solid State Physics”, Charles Kittel, 8th Ed., John Wiley & Sons, Inc., USA, (2009).
3. “Solid State Electronic Devices”, Ben G. Streetman and Stanjay Banerjee, 6th Ed., Prentice Hall, Inc., USA (2006).
